content:
Hello,
I have some problems with the syntax in Tactics. More precisely, I am having difficulty determining if the goal has been accomplished.

If I don't write a comma on the last line, nothing appears:
image1.png

If I place the cursor at the beginning of the keyword "end," nothing happens:
image2.png

The only solution I found is to write a comma at the last line:
image3.png

My question is: Is this normal for an installation on VS Code (and if not do you have any idea from where it comes)?
Yes, this is a known issue. Simply add a trailing comma when your line doesn't end with a }.
Gabriel Soranzo has marked this topic as resolved.
